item.title: What is Hugo?
item.description: Hugo is a general-purpose website framework. Technically speaking, Hugo is a static site generator. Unlike other systems which dynamically build a page every time a visitor requests one, Hugo does the building when you create your content. Since websites are viewed far more often than they are edited, Hugo is optimized for website viewing while providing a great writing experience. Sites built with Hugo are extremely fast and very secure.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hugo is written in Go with support for multiple platforms. The latest release can be found at Hugo Releases. We currently provide pre-built binaries for  Windows,  Linux,  FreeBSD and  OS X (Darwin) for x64, i386 and ARM architectures. Hugo may also be compiled from source wherever the Go compiler tool chain can run, e.g. for other operating systems including DragonFly BSD, OpenBSD, Plan 9 and Solaris. See http://golang.org/doc/install/source for the full set of supported combinations of target operating systems and compilation architectures.

item.title: The main event dates of the Zen Simple Assise network
item.description: Ango at La Saulsaie from July 26th to August 20th near Lyon 1st session led by Brigitte Seiriki Stark, 2nd session directed by Philippe Reiryu Coupey, 3rd session led by Bruno Kaiho Peslerbe. Flyer Please, subscribe to Ango preferably via the Online form The summer sesshin directed by Jean-Claude Reisaku Saint-Prix from 21 to July 23 in Burgundy Flyer The sesshin in Brittany led by Bruno Peslerbe on 20-21 May in Poullan sur Mer (29100)

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Zen Simple Assise is a sangha network of former disciples of Master Deshimaru and other more recent practitioners. They combine their energy and experience to Dissemination of the practice and teaching transmitted in the Of Master Deshimaru, Master Kodo Sawaki and their predecessors of Zen Soto. Zen Simple Assise is a common space for meetings, exchanges and Reflection to protect zazen from the current trends and institutions. We organize different events such as the anniversary of the death of Master Deshimaru a Mokudo sesshin in Spain, thriving to embrace the spirit of the original sangha.
